info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 8:06PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong winds and brief heavy snowfall will impact portions of Phillips County through 900 PM MST... At 803 PM MST, Doppler Radar and surface observing sites are reporting strong gusty winds associated with a cold front. Along with strong winds, brief heavy snowfall with low visibility may be possible in the statement area. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malta, Whitewater, Zortman, Dodson, Fourchette, Loring, Port Of Morgan, Phillips, Chapman, Sleeping Buffalo, Wagner, Fred Robinson Bridge, Landusky, Content, Sun Prairie and Bowdoin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and use extra caution driving through strong winds and heavy snowfall
